lol I had to set the scrolling speed to '4'

btw, Thanx a bunch for that info hald0, I never would have thought to look in the registry and the game would not have been playable. 

everyone else, if you use the regedit to change teh scrollspeed make sure not to alter it in the options. turning the fast scroll on sets it to 64, and turning it off sets it to 20.

If you have too powerfull pc it may cause crashes at beggining. To fix it: 

Start > Run 
enter "dxdiag" 
go to "display" page (in my winXp_PL its called "Ekran", i hope i translated it correctly)

disable DirectDraw

Try running game now.
